sentences.sContent: I think he’s harbouring some sort of grudge against me.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得他对我有点怀恨在心。

sentences.sContent: Sinks and draining boards can harbour germs.
sentences.sCn: 洗涤槽和沥水板可能藏有病菌。

sentences.sContent: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.sCn: 匈牙利前领导人被指控窝藏疑犯。

sentences.sContent: ...challenging those who still harbour racist sentiments...

phrases.pCn: 海港城（地名，位于香港尖沙咀）
港湾工程，港口工程；海港工程

words.tran: 居住，生存；入港停泊；躲藏

trans.tranCn: 怀着（不好的想法、恐惧或希望）；包含，藏有；窝藏
trans.tranOther: to keep bad thoughts, fears, or hopes in your mind for a long time
